solution_line_template: Since November has {days_in_november} days, the town received 4 inches of rain for the first half of the month for {days_in_november}/{days_in_half_month} = {first_period_days} days.

The total inches of rain that the town received for the 15 days is {first_period_days}*{rainfall_per_day_first} = <<{first_period_days}*{rainfall_per_day_first}={rainfall_first_period}>>{rainfall_first_period} inches.

The rain falling in the town increased by {rainfall_multiplier}*{rainfall_per_day_first} = <<{rainfall_multiplier}*{rainfall_per_day_first}={rainfall_per_day_second}>>{rainfall_per_day_second} inches per day for the remaining half of the month.

Therefore, for the rest of the month, the town received {rainfall_per_day_second}*{first_period_days} = <<{rainfall_per_day_second}*{first_period_days}={rainfall_second_period}>>{rainfall_second_period} inches of rain.

The total amount of rain the town received in November is {rainfall_second_period}+{rainfall_first_period} = <<{rainfall_second_period}+{rainfall_first_period}={total_rainfall}>>{total_rainfall} inches
